item.title: Understanding Traffic Changes During COVID-19 Through Waze Data
item.description: The World Bankâ€™s Development Data Group leveraged Waze data to examine the impact of the COVID-19 pandemic on city traffic. This study is part of the Atlas of Sustainable Development Goals 2023, which aims to be a reservoir of knowledge about the SDGs for policymakers, academics, journalists, and the public at large.
